name: Trippin Pug
description:
what happens when a bumbling pug eats a weird mushroom and bumps into a hose? 

a chaotic hack and slash boss battle game. 

Defeat the giant snake with your different weapon destroying the room in the process.

you can throw objects at the boss by hitting them.

Controls:
  •  AWSD - move 
  • Spacebar - jump 
  • Shift - run
  • Right click - dodge 
  • Left click - attack
  • R - change weapon
  • E - attack
  • Q - dodge 
Used assets:
  • Low Poly Ultimate pack
  • Polygon Prototype - Low Poly 3D
  • Snaps Prototype - Asian Residential
  • Cartoon FX
  • HEROIC FANTASY CREATURES FULL PACK Volume 1
  • https://www.dafont.com/pt/ginchiest.font
  • https://www.dafont.com/pt/fresh-pickle.font
